name: Mind Your Step (Fontys Game Design & Technology)
name_original: Mind Your Step (Fontys Game Design & Technology)
description:
Please fill out the form if you have time: https://forms.gle/zqYKYUKQsQHNV2RC7

Controls
WASD to move
Space to jump
R to open progress report.

There is a puzzle in the first room, after that the goal is to reach the doors at the end of the levels. 

You can use the report card to check what you did. There's a sound notification when you find something new.

SPOILER: There are two elements you can get on the first level. The second level has an (easter) egg. The third level has a hidden easier way of making it through the level. You can also finish an elemental path with a matching or opposite element.

WebGL had audio issues so there's a zip file you have to download and extract, then just play the Duo Game.exe inside.
